name: Schnipps
overview:
Schnipps puts personal data where it belongs: into the hands of the owner. It empowers you to control where your data goes and how it is used - and it is kept in sync at all times. Access rights and data transfers are secured through an encryption scheme that even prevents us from seeing the users’ data.

Secret sauce We guarantee absolute confidentiality of the users’ data by encrypting it on the client side and never sending the password to our server. What we (or a hacker) can see there is completely meaningless bits and bytes. This only works as long as we have no need to use any of the data. This is why we believe that none of the “big boys” will penetrate our market too quickly, as their business models rely on knowing a lot about their users.

The award winning MySchnipps app provides a new way to share contact data that goes beyond current smart phone address books. The app was awarded the “App of the month April 2012” at telefon.de, and made it into the “BEST of 2012 - Web 2.0 & Social” of initiative-mittelstand.de - it is released for Android and iOS.

MySchnipps is the Innovative Address Book and contacts manager for smartphones that gives you control of your own data.
